title: BIGFOOT Free Download Direct Link
description:
BIGFOOT (Finding Bigfoot) is an exciting action adventure with a mixture of detective story, shooter and stealth. Here you will have to go to the dark forest in order to find the real Bigfoot, Bigfoot According to the plot, something happened in a fictional town â€“ a group of tourists disappeared without a trace in the local forest, and no one knows what could have happened to them. According to rumors, they could have been kidnapped by Bigfoot, or as it is called in the game, Bigfoot.
Well, the player is invited to go into the forest and try to find it, and ideally also catch it. But do not think that it will be easy, because in the process of capturing Bigfoot , you will have to use a variety of mechanics. You have a unique opportunity to gather a team of friends or go on a solitary expedition to the forests of wild reserves and feel like a real hunter for Bigfoots. You have to hunt in different weather conditions, trail an animal, set traps, explore locations, search for Bigfoots lair, guard against other dangerous animals and much more.
